pt.ist.fenixframework.backend
Class OID

java.lang.Object
  pt.ist.fenixframework.backend.OID
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<OID>
public class OID
extends Object
implements Comparable<OID>, Serializable

This class provides an internal representation of a DomainObject's identifier using a UUID.

See Also:

Method Detail

makeNew

public static OID makeNew(Class objClass,
                          LocalityHints hints)
Create a new Object IDentifier for the given class. For the special class DomainRoot, it will always return the same ROOT_OBJECT_ID. Any LocalityHints for the DomainRoot object are ignored, as this object always exists.

Parameters:
objClass - The Class of the DomainObject for which to create a new OID.
hints - The LocalityHints if any.
Returns:
A unique identifier for an object of the given type.

makeNew

public static OID makeNew(Class objClass)
Calls makeNew(Class, LocalityHints) with null LocalityHints.

See Also:
makeNew(Class, LocalityHints)

fromExternalId

public static OID fromExternalId(String externalId)
Creates an OID from the given external representation. If the external representation as been tampered with, the results of this method are undefined.

Parameters:
externalId - The external representation of the object's identifier.
Returns:
the OID that corresponds to the given external representation

public static OID recoverFromFullId(String fullId)

getLocalityHints

public LocalityHints getLocalityHints()
Get the LocalityHints of this OID.

Returns:
The LocalityHints instance or null is this OID does not have LocalityHints
